rows.label: qst201416_msg0001
rows.name:
Nothing wrong with staying up chatting.
But don't cause a load of hassle for
everyone else.

rows.label: qst201416_msg0002
rows.name:
You'll just get everyone
all wound up again.

rows.label: qst201416_msg0003
rows.name:
If you want to blather about
shoes all night, be my guest.
Just leave me out of it!

rows.label: qst201416_msg0004
rows.name:
But I think you already knew that from
when I got angry with you...

rows.label: qst201416_msg0005
rows.name:
You stayed up all night with your idle
chatter, did you? I'll wager my advice
went in one ear and out the other.

rows.label: qst201416_msg0006
rows.name:
Still, I think you did learn an important
lesson. I'll say no more!

rows.label: qst201416_msg0007
rows.name:
Nothing wrong with a bit of late night
banter, Zakuro. But there's no need to
put others out.

rows.label: qst201416_msg0008
rows.name:
You don't want to have to sit through
another of Meleph's lectures, do you?

rows.label: qst201416_msg0011
rows.name:
...sometimes it's fun to get caught up
in conversation, don't you think?

rows.label: qst201416_msg0012
rows.name:
I hope we'll get chance for a little
tête-à-tête sometime soon...

rows.label: qst201416_msg0013
rows.name:
I hope we'll get chance for a little
tête-à-tête sometime soon...

rows.label: qst201416_msg0014
rows.name:
I hope we'll get chance for a little
tête-à-tête sometime soon...

rows.label: qst201416_msg0015
rows.name:
I hope we'll get chance for a little
tête-à-tête sometime soon...

rows.label: qst201416_msg0016
rows.name:
Yeah, well, I'd look forward to that too.
You're good company, Zakuro.

rows.label: qst201416_msg0017
rows.name:
Well,okay. But we'll have to fix it so
Meleph doesn't find us and give us a
lecture.

rows.label: qst201416_msg0018
rows.name:
I'm game for that, Zakuro. I don't mind
saying, you're an absolute hoot.

rows.label: qst201416_msg0019
rows.name:
You don't seem chastened at all...
Why, there's something to admire in
that, Zakuro.
